nodes.text: Jeg was a male A'Mar, the Human settlers of Lamus. He was not eligible to participate in the Vigil as he had already drank the waters from the Wellspring. He took part in the Beastlord's Hunt when he was attacked by a Brachian Beastlord and was poisoned. The group went to the Wellspring to seek help from the offworlders protecting it at that time.
